visualization_prompt: Generate a bullet chart showing revenue performance against target using qualitative range bands
visualization_explanation: This bullet chart visualizes revenue performance against annual targets with three qualitative ranges. The dataset contains one quantitative measure (revenue in thousands) with a target comparison. Synthetic data maintains financial plausibility: actual value (μ=275k) exceeds target (250k) by +10%. Plot bands represent performance tiers (0-150k=low, 150-225k=medium, 225-300k=high). The inverted layout optimizes horizontal space per Tufte's data-ink principles. Cairo's perceptual effectiveness is achieved through position/length encoding and categorical color bands. Target line uses 200% width for clear differentiation. Margin adjustments accommodate long categorical labels while maintaining chart integrity.
